Action.author: scottz
Action.body: And another testcase in this file was backed out with a different changeset last week: FAB-13983. Problem appears to be an install problem, maybe with bad chaincode path for ex04 (although it looks correct in the feature file, so maybe it was a timing thing, or a container was not created as expected) `no Go files in /opt/gopath/src/github.com/hyperledger/fabric-test/chaincodes/example04`
